              Exchange<br>
            </b></p>

  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><b>Exhibit 5.1</b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b>&#160;</b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b></b></p>
  <table style="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="width: 49%">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>Fried, Frank, Harris, Shriver &amp; Jacobson LLP</b></font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">One
              New York Plaza<br>
              New York, New York 10004&#160;</font></p>
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">Tel:
              +1.212.859.8000&#160;</font></p>

          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">www.friedfrank.com</font></p>
        </td>
        <td style="width: 2%"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></td>
        <td style="width: 49%; text-align: right"><img src="nt10021707x7ex5-1_image01.jpg" alt=""><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></td>

  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b></b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">March 23, 2021</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">T-Mobile US, Inc.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">T-Mobile USA, Inc.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">12920 SE 38th Street</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Bellevue, WA 98006</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Ladies and Gentlemen:</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">We have acted as counsel to T-Mobile USA, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the <u>&#8220;Company</u>&#8221;), T-Mobile US, Inc., a Delaware corporation and
    the direct parent of the Company (the &#8220;<u>Parent Guarantor</u>&#8221;), the subsidiaries of the Company listed on Schedule I hereto (together with the Parent Guarantor, the &#8220;<u>DE/NY Guarantors</u>&#8221;) and the subsidiaries of the Company listed on Schedule II
    hereto (the &#8220;<u>Non-DE/NY Guarantors</u>&#8221; and, collectively with the DE/NY Guarantors and the Parent Guarantor, the &#8220;<u>Guarantors</u>&#8221;), in connection with the Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No. 333-249079) (the &#8220;<u>Registration Statement</u>&#8221;),
    filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission (the &#8220;Commission&#8221;) under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#8220;<u>Securities Act</u>&#8221;), with respect to the issuance of $1,200,000,000 in aggregate principal amount of the Company&#8217;s 2.625% Senior
    Notes due 2026 (the &#8220;<u>2026 Debt Securities</u>&#8221;) and the guarantees by the Guarantors thereof (the &#8220;<u>2026 Debt Securities Guarantees</u>&#8221;), $1,250,000,000 in aggregate principal amount of the Company&#8217;s 3.375% Senior Notes due 2029 (the &#8220;<u>2029
      Debt Securities</u>&#8221;) and the guarantees by the Guarantors thereof (the &#8220;<u>2029 Debt Securities Guarantees</u>&#8221;) and $1,350,000,000 in aggregate principal amount of the Company&#8217;s 3.500% Senior Notes due 2031 (the &#8220;<u>2031 Debt Securities</u>&#8221;, and
    together with the 2026 Debt Securities and the 2029 Debt Securities, the &#8220;<u>Debt Securities</u>&#8221;) and the guarantees by the Guarantors thereof (the &#8220;<u>2031 Debt Securities Guarantees</u>&#8221; and, together with the 2026 Debt Securities Guarantees and the
    2029 Debt Securities Guarantees, the &#8220;<u>Debt Securities Guarantees</u>&#8221;). The Debt Securities and the Debt Securities Guarantees are being offered and sold in a public offering pursuant to an underwriting agreement dated March 16, 2021 by and among
    the Company, the Guarantors and Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, as representative of the several underwriters (the <u>&#8220;Underwriting Agreement</u>&#8221;).</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">The Debt Securities and the Debt Securities Guarantees have been issued pursuant to an indenture, dated as of April 28, 2013 (the &#8220;<u>Base
      Indenture</u>&#8221;), among the Company, the guarantors party thereto and Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas, as trustee (the &#8220;<u>Trustee</u>&#8221;), as heretofore supplemented, and as further supplemented by the Forty-Sixth Supplemental Indenture, dated as
    of March 23, 2021 (the &#8220;<u>Forty-Sixth Supplemental Indenture</u>&#8221;), among the Company, the Guarantors and the Trustee, with respect to the 2026 Debt Securities and the 2026 Debt Securities Guarantees, as further supplemented by the Forty-Seventh
    Supplemental Indenture, dated as of March 23, 2021 (the &#8220;<u>Forty-Seventh Supplemental Indenture</u>&#8221;), among the Company, the Guarantors and the Trustee, with respect to the 2029 Debt Securities and the 2029 Debt Securities Guarantees and as further
    supplemented by the Forty-Eighth Supplemental Indenture, dated as of March 23, 2021 (the &#8220;<u>Forty-Eighth Supplemental Indenture</u>&#8221;), among the Company, the Guarantors and the Trustee, with respect to the 2031 Debt Securities and the 2031 Debt
    Securities Guarantees (the Base Indenture, as heretofore supplemented and as further supplemented by the Forty-Sixth Supplemental Indenture, the Forty-Seventh Supplemental Indenture and the Forty-Eighth Supplemental Indenture, the &#8220;<u>Indenture</u>&#8221;).</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;<font style="font-size: 1pt; font-family: Verdana, Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>New
        York &#9679; Washington DC &#9679; London &#9679; Frankfurt</b></font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">Fried,
      Frank, Harris, Shriver &amp; Jacobson LLP is a Delaware Limited Liability Partnership</font></p>
  <!--Field:/Rule-Page-->
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman,Times,Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal"></font>&#160;</div>
    <div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
      <hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
    </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"></p>
  <table style="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="width: 49%">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>Fried,
                Frank, Harris, Shriver &amp; Jacobson LLP</b></font></p>
        </td>
        <td style="width: 2%"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></td>
        <td style="width: 49%; text-align: right">March 23, 2021<br>
          Page
          <!-- [if supportFields]><span style=&#x2019;mso-bidi-font-size:10.0pt;
  mso-fareast-font-family:Calibri;mso-bidi-font-weight:bold&#x2019;><span
  style=&#x2019;mso-element:field-begin&#x2019;></font><span
  style=&#x2019;mso-spacerun:yes&#x2019;>&#160;</font>PAGE<span style=&#x2019;mso-spacerun:yes&#x2019;>&#160;
  </font>\* MERGEFORMAT <span style=&#x2019;mso-element:field-separator&#x2019;></font></font><![endif]-->2<font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt"></font></td>
      </tr>

  </table>
  <p style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0">&#160;<font style="font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">In connection with this opinion, we have (i) investigated such questions of law, (ii) examined originals or certified, conformed, electronic or
    reproduction copies of such agreements, instruments, documents and records of the Company and the Guarantors, such certificates of public officials and such other documents and (iii) received such information from officers and representatives of the
    Company, the Guarantors and others, in each case as we have deemed necessary or appropriate for the purposes of this opinion. We have examined, among other documents, the following:</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(a) the Underwriting Agreement;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(b) the Base Indenture;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(c) the Forty-Sixth Supplemental Indenture;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(d) the Forty-Seventh Supplemental Indenture;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(e) the Forty-Eighth Supplemental Indenture;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(f) the Debt Securities; and&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 36.0pt;">(g) the notations of guarantee evidencing the Debt Securities Guarantees.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">The documents referred to in items (a) through (g) above, inclusive, are referred to herein collectively as the &#8220;<u>Documents</u>.&#8221;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">In all such examinations, we have assumed the legal capacity of all natural persons, the genuineness of all signatures, the authenticity of
    original and certified documents and the conformity to original or certified documents of all copies submitted to us as certified, conformed, electronic or reproduction copies. As to various questions of fact relevant to the opinion expressed herein,
    we have relied upon, and assume the accuracy of, the statements, representations and warranties contained in the Documents, certificates and oral or written statements and other information of or from public officials, officers or other appropriate
    representatives of the Company, the Guarantors and others and assume compliance on the part of all parties to the Documents with their respective covenants and agreements contained therein.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">With your permission, all assumptions and statements of reliance herein have been made without any independent investigation or verification on
    our part and we express no opinion with respect to the subject matter or accuracy of such assumptions or items relied upon.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">To the extent it may be relevant to the opinions expressed herein, we have assumed that (i) all of the parties to the Documents (other than the
    Company and the DE/NY Guarantors) are validly existing and in good standing under the laws of their respective jurisdictions of organization; (ii) the parties to the Documents (other than the Company and the DE/NY Guarantors) have the power and
    authority to (a) execute and deliver the Documents, (b) perform their obligations thereunder and (c) consummate the transactions contemplated thereby; (iii) each of the Documents has been duly authorized, executed and delivered by each of the parties
    thereto (other than the Company and the DE/NY Guarantors); (iv) each of the Documents constitutes a valid and binding obligation of all of the parties thereto (other than as expressly addressed in the opinions below as to the Company and the
    Guarantors), enforceable against such parties in accordance with their respective terms and (v) all of the parties to the Documents will comply with all of their obligations under the Documents and all laws applicable thereto, (vi) the Debt Securities
    have been duly authenticated and delivered by the Trustee against payment therefor in accordance with the Documents and (vii) the Debt Securities and the notations of guarantee evidencing the Debt Securities Guarantees conform to the specimens thereof
    examined by us.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">Based upon the foregoing, and subject to the limitations, qualifications and assumptions set forth herein, we are of the opinion that the Debt
    Securities constitute valid and binding obligations of the Company enforceable against the Company in accordance with their terms and the Debt Securities Guarantees constitute valid and binding obligations of the Guarantors enforceable against the
    Guarantors in accordance with their terms.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">We express no opinion as to the validity, binding effect or enforceability of any provision of any of the Documents:<br>
    <br>
  </p>
  <table style="width: 100%;" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">

      <tr>
        <td style="width:54pt;" valign="top">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
        </td>
        <td style="width:22pt;" valign="top">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;">(i)</p>
        </td>
        <td valign="top">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;">relating to indemnification, contribution or exculpation;</p>
        </td>
      </tr>

  </table>

    be located or wherein enforcement of any Documents may be sought that limits the rates of interest legally chargeable or collectible.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">We express no opinion as to any agreement, instrument or other document (including any agreement, instrument or other document referred to, or
    incorporated by reference in, the Documents) other than the Documents.</p>

    <br>

            or affecting creditors&#8217; rights or remedies generally;</p>

            equitable defenses and limits as to the availability of equitable remedies) whether such principles are considered in a proceeding in equity or at law; and</p>

    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal"></font>&#160;</div>

    </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>

        <td valign="top">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-right: 0pt;">Provisions in the Debt Securities Guarantees and the Indenture that provide that the Guarantors&#8217; liability thereunder shall not be
            affected by (i) actions or failures to act on the part of the holders or the Trustee, (ii) amendments or waivers of provisions of documents governing the guaranteed obligations or (iii) other actions, events or circumstances that make more
            burdensome or otherwise change the obligations and liabilities of the Guarantors, might not be enforceable under circumstances and in the event of actions that change the essential nature of the terms and conditions of the guaranteed
            obligations. With respect to each Guarantor, we have assumed that consideration that is sufficient to support the agreements of each Guarantor under the Documents has been received by each Guarantor.</p>
        </td>
      </tr>

  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160; &#160;The opinion expressed herein is limited to the laws of the State of New York and to the extent relevant to the opinion expressed herein, the General
    Corporation Law of the State of Delaware, t<font style="background: white;">he Limited Liability Company Act of the State of Delaware and the Delaware Revised Uniform Limited Partnership Act,</font> each as currently in effect, and no opinion is
    expressed with respect to any other laws or any effect that such other laws may have on the opinion expressed herein. This opinion letter is limited to the matters stated herein, and no opinion is implied or may be inferred beyond the matters expressly
    stated herein. T<font style="background: white;">his letter is given only as of the time of its delivery, and w</font>e undertake no responsibility to update or supplement this letter after its delivery.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">We hereby consent to the filing of this opinion as an exhibit to the Current Report on Form 8-K filed by the Company on the date hereof, which
    will be incorporated by reference in the Registration Statement and to the references to this firm under the caption &#8220;Legal Matters&#8221; in the prospectus supplements related to the Debt Securities and the Debt Securities Guarantees. In giving this
    consent, we do not hereby admit that we are in the category of persons whose consent is required under Section 7 of the Securities Act or the rules and regulations of the Securities and Exchange Commission.</p>

  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt; text-align: right"><b><u>EXHIBIT 5.2</u></b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt">&#160;</p>
  <table style="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="width: 100%; text-align: center">&#160;<img src="nt10021707x7ex5-2_image01.jpg" alt=""></td>
      </tr>
      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="text-align: center">&#160;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="text-align: center"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">900 West 48th Place, Suite 900, Kansas City, Missouri, 64112&#160; <font style="color: gray">&#9679;&#160; </font>816.753.1000</font></td>
      </tr>

  </table>
  <p style="margin-top: 0; margin-bottom: 0">&#160;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: justify; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="background: white;">March 23, 2021</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; background: white; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">Board of Directors</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; background: white; margin-top: 0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">T-Mobile&#160;US, Inc.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; background: white; margin-top: 0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">12920 SE 38th Street</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; background: white; margin-top: 0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">Bellevue, Washington 98006</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">Ladies and Gentlemen:</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">We have acted as special local counsel to those certain subsidiaries of T-Mobile US, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;<b>Parent</b>&#8221;), listed
    on <u>Schedule A</u> hereto (the &#8220;<b>Opinion Guarantors</b>&#8221;) <font style="background: white;">in connection with the </font>Underwriting Agreement dated as of <font style="background: white;">March 16, 2021</font> (the &#8220;<b>Underwriting Agreement</b>&#8221;),
    by and among T-Mobile USA, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#8220;<b><font style="background: white;"><b>T-Mobile</b></font></b>&#8221;), the Parent, each of the subsidiary guarantors (together with the Parent, the &#8220;<b>Guarantors</b>&#8221;) party thereto (including the
    Opinion Guarantors), and Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, relating to the issuance by T-Mobile of $1,200,000,000 aggregate principal amount of T-Mobile&#8217;s 2.625% Senior Notes due 20<font style="background: white;">26</font> (the &#8220;<b>2026 Notes</b>&#8221;),
    $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of T-Mobile&#8217;s 3.375% Senior Notes due 20<font style="background: white;">29</font> (the &#8220;<b>2029 Notes</b>&#8221;) and $1,350,000,000 aggregate principal amount of T-Mobile&#8217;s 3.500% Senior Notes due 20<font style="background: white;">31</font> (the &#8220;<b>2031 Notes</b>&#8221; and, together with the 20<font style="background: white;">26</font> Notes and the 2029 Notes, the &#8220;<b>Notes</b>&#8221;). T-Mobile&#8217;s obligations under the Notes will be guaranteed (such
    guarantees, the &#8220;<b>Guarantees</b>&#8221;) on a senior unsecured basis by the Guarantors (including the Opinion Guarantors). The Notes and the Guarantees are being offered pursuant to a prospectus supplement dated <font style="background: white;">March 16,
      2021</font> and the accompanying base prospectus dated September 28, 2020 (such documents, collectively, the &#8220;<b>Prospectus</b>&#8221;) that form part of the Parent&#8217;s registration statement on Form S-3ASR (File No. 333-249079) (the &#8220;<b>Registration
      Statement</b>&#8221;) filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on September 28, 2020, under the Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#8220;<b>Securities Act</b>&#8221;). <font style="background: white;">This opinion letter is furnished to you at your
      request to enable you to fulfill the requirements of Item 601(b)(5)&#160;of Regulation S-K, 17 C.F.R. &#167; 229.601(b)(5), in connection with the Registration Statement. </font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="background: white;">For purposes of this opinion letter, we have examined copies of such agreements, instruments and
      documents as we have deemed an appropriate basis on which to render the opinions hereinafter expressed. In our examination of the aforesaid documents, we have assumed the genuineness of all signatures, the accuracy and completeness of all documents
      submitted to us, the authenticity of all original documents, and the conformity to authentic original documents of all documents submitted to us as copies (including electronic copies). We have also assumed the legal capacity for all purposes
      relevant hereto of all natural persons and, with respect to all parties to agreements or instruments relevant hereto other than the </font>Opinion Guarantors<font style="background: white;">, that such parties had the requisite power and authority
      (corporate or otherwise) to execute, deliver and perform such agreements or instruments, that such parties have duly authorized such agreements or instruments by all requisite action (corporate or otherwise), that such agreements or instruments have
      been duly executed and delivered by such parties and that such agreements or instruments are the valid, binding and enforceable obligations of all parties thereto. As to all matters of fact,&#160;we have relied on the representations and statements of
      fact made in the documents so reviewed, including all statements in certificates of public officials and officers of the </font>Opinion<font style="background: white;"> Guarantors that we reviewed, and we have not independently established the facts
      so relied on. This opinion letter is given, and all statements herein are made, in the context of the foregoing.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;&#160;</p>
  <table style="width: 100%; margin: 0px; width: 100%; margin-top: 0px; margin-right: 0px; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 0px" border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

      <tr>
        <td colspan="11" style="vertical-align: top; border-bottom: Black 1pt solid; padding-bottom: 3pt">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt"><font style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; color: #990000">polsinelli.com</font></p>
          <p></p>
        </td>
      </tr>

          <p></p>
        </td>

          <p></p>

          <p></p>

        <td style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td colspan="2" style="text-align: center; vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td colspan="2" style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
        <td style="vertical-align: top">&#160;</td>
      </tr>
      <tr>
        <td colspan="10" valign="TOP">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt"><font style="font: 10pt Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif">Polsinelli PC, Polsinelli LLP in California</font></p>
          <p></p>
        </td>
        <td style="vertical-align: top">
          <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 0pt;"><font style="font-family: Arial, Helvetica, Sans-Serif; font-size: 10pt">&#160;</font></p>
        </td>
      </tr>

  </table>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 12.0pt 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div id="DSPFPageBreakArea" style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt">
    <div id="DSPFPageNumberArea" style="TEXT-ALIGN: center"><font id="DSPFPageNumber" style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal"></font>&#160;</div>
    <div id="DSPFPageBreak" style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always">
      <hr style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000" noshade="noshade">
    </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="background: white;">This opinion letter is based as to matters of law solely on the applicable provisions of the laws of the
      State of Georgia, the State of Kansas, the State of Nevada, the State of Texas and the Commonwealth of Virginia (but not including any laws, statutes, ordinances, administrative decisions, rules&#160;or regulations of any political subdivision below the
      state level), as currently in effect. We express no opinion herein as to any other statutes, rules&#160;or regulations (and in particular,&#160;we express no opinion as to any effect that such other statutes, rules&#160;or regulations may have on the opinions
      expressed herein).</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;"><font style="background: white;">Based upon, subject to and limited by the foregoing, we are of the opinion that</font>:</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Each Opinion Guarantor is validly existing <font style="background: white;">as a corporation or </font>limited liability
    company, as applicable, under the laws of such Opinion Guarantor&#8217;s state of incorporation or organization, as the case may be, designated on <u>Schedule A</u> hereto (each, an &#8220;<b>Opinion Jurisdiction</b>&#8221;).</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Each Opinion Guarantor <font style="background: white;">has the corporate or </font>limited liability company<font style="background: white;"> power</font>, as applicable,<font style="background: white;"> under </font>the laws of its respective Opinion Jurisdiction <font style="background: white;">to issue its </font>Guarantee.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Each Guarantee has been duly authorized by each Opinion Guarantor.</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: left; text-indent: 36.0pt; margin: 0pt 0pt 0pt 0pt;">This opinion letter has been prepared for use in connection with the filing by the Parent of a Current Report on Form 8-K relating to the
    offering, sale and issuance of the Notes and the Guarantees. <font style="background: white;">This opinion letter is given only as of the time of its delivery, and we assume no obligation or responsibility to update or supplement this opinion letter
      after its delivery.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36.0pt; background: white; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt;"><font style="background-color: white">We
      hereby consent to the filing of this opinion letter as Exhibit&#160;5.2 to the </font>above-described Form 8-K <font style="background-color: white">and
      to the reference to this firm under the caption &#8220;</font>Legal Matters<font style="background-color: white">&#8221; in the
    </font>Prospectus<font style="background-color: white">. In giving this consent,&#160;we do not thereby admit that we are an &#8220;expert&#8221;
      within the meaning of the Securities Act.</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36pt; background-color: white; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><font style="background-color: white">&#160;</font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-indent: 36pt; background-color: white; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><font style="background-color: white"></font></p>
  <table style="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="width: 50%">&#160;</td>
        <td style="width: 20%">Very truly yours,</td>
        <td style="width: 30%">&#160;</td>
      </tr>

<body>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b>Exhibit 5.3</b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&#160;&#160;&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"></p>
  <table cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" style="border-collapse: collapse; font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; width: 100%">

      <tr style="vertical-align: top; text-align: left">
        <td style="width: 50%">&#160;<img alt="" src="nt10021707x7ex5-3_image01.jpg"></td>
        <td style="width: 50%">&#160;</td>
      </tr>

  </table>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;text-align: center;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">March 23, 2021</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Board of Directors</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">T-Mobile US, Inc.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">12920 SE 38th Street</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Bellevue, Washington 98006</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-left: 72.0pt;text-indent: -40.5pt;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Re:&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; <u>Registration Statement on Form S-3</u></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Ladies and Gentlemen:</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; This firm acts as special local counsel to Sprint Communications Company of New Hampshire, Inc., a New Hampshire corporation (the &#8220;Opinion Guarantor&#8221;), a
    subsidiary of T-Mobile US, Inc., a Delaware corporation (the &#8220;Parent&#8221;),&#160; in connection with the Registration Statement on Form S-3 (File No. 333-249079) (the &#8220;Registration Statement&#8221;), filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission under the
    Securities Act of 1933, as amended (the &#8220;Securities Act&#8221;) by the Parent, T-Mobile USA, Inc., a Delaware corporation (&#8220;T-Mobile&#8221;), and certain subsidiaries of T-Mobile (including the Opinion Guarantor), with respect to the issuance of (i) $1,200,000,000
    aggregate principal amount of T-Mobile&#8217;s 2.625% Senior Notes due 2026 (the &#8220;2026 Notes&#8221;), $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of T-Mobile&#8217;s 3.375% Senior Notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 Notes&#8221;) and $1,350,000,000 aggregate principal amount of
    T-Mobile&#8217;s 3.500% Senior Notes due 2031 (the &#8220;2031 Notes&#8221; and, together with the 2026 Notes and the 2029 Notes, the &#8220;Notes&#8221;) and (ii) the guarantees of the Notes on a senior unsecured basis by Parent and certain of the T-Mobile&#8217;s wholly-owned
    subsidiaries (collectively with Parent, the &#8220;Guarantors&#8221;), including the Opinion Guarantor (the guarantees of the Opinion Guarantor, the &#8220;Guarantees&#8221;). The Notes and the Guarantees are being offered pursuant to a prospectus supplement dated March 16,
    2021 and the accompanying base prospectus dated September 28, 2020 (such documents, collectively, the &#8220;Prospectus&#8221;) that form part of the Registration Statement. This opinion letter is furnished to you at your request to enable you to fulfill the
    requirements of Item 601(b)(5) of Regulation S-K, 17 C.F.R. &#167; 229.601(b)(5), in connection with the Registration Statement.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <div style="text-align: right; color: #00477F; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">McLane Middleton, Professional Association</div>
  <div style="text-align: right; color: #00477F; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">Manchester, Concord, Portsmouth, NH&#160; |&#160; Woburn, Boston, MA</div>
  <div><br>
  </div>
  <div style="text-align: right; color: #374652; font-family: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; font-size: 10pt;">McLane.com</div>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"> </p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber"></font>&#160;</div>
    <div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;text-align: right;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">March 23, 2021</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Page 2</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;text-align: right;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In preparation of this opinion we have examined the following documents:</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 1.&#160; the Articles of Incorporation of the Opinion Guarantor;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.&#160; the Bylaws of the Opinion Guarantor; </p>
  <br>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 3.&#160; the Omnibus Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors, Board of Managers, Sole Member, Members or Managing Member, Manager or General
    Partner or General Partners, as Applicable, In Lieu of Meeting, dated March 15, 2021; and</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 4.&#160; such other documents and items as we deemed necessary for the purposes of this opinion.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; We have assumed without independent verification that the information furnished by the Opinion Guarantor is accurate.&#160; We have not conducted any
    independent outside review of agreements, contracts, indentures, instruments, orders, judgments, rules, regulations, writs, injunctions, or decrees by which the Opinion Guarantor or any of its property may be bound nor, except as noted above, have we
    made any outside independent investigation as to the existence of actions, suits, investigations, or proceedings, if any, pending or threatened against the Opinion Guarantor.&#160; We have not reviewed the financial books or records of the Company (or any
    of its subsidiaries) and, unless expressly stated, do not express any opinion as to financial or tax matters or compliance with tax laws.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; In addition to the documents listed above, for purposes of this opinion letter, we have examined copies of such other agreements, instruments, and
    documents as we have deemed necessary to render the opinions hereinafter expressed.&#160; In our examination of the aforesaid documents, we have assumed the genuineness of all signatures, the accuracy and completeness of all documents submitted to us, the
    authenticity of all original documents, and the conformity to authentic original documents of all documents submitted to us as copies (including electronic copies).&#160; We have also assumed the legal capacity of all natural persons and, with respect to
    all parties to agreements or instruments other than the Opinion Guarantor, that such parties had the requisite power and authority (corporate or otherwise) to execute, deliver, and perform such agreements or instruments, that such parties have duly
    authorized such agreements or instruments by all requisite action (corporate or otherwise), that such agreements or instruments have been executed, and delivered by such parties, and that such agreements or instruments are the valid, binding, and
    enforceable obligations of all parties thereto.&#160; As to all matters of fact, we have relied on the representations and statements of fact made in the documents so reviewed, including all statements in certificates of public officials and officers of the
    Opinion Guarantor that we reviewed, and we have not independently established the facts we relied on.&#160; This opinion letter is given, and all statements herein are made, in the context of the foregoing.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; We are members of the Bar of the State of New Hampshire, and we express no opinion as to matters involving the laws of any jurisdiction other than the
    State of New Hampshire.&#160; This opinion is limited to the effect of the laws (including administrative and judicial interpretations) of the State of New Hampshire as they existed on the date of this letter and to the facts bearing&#160;upon the opinions below
    as they existed on the date of this letter, and we expressly disclaim any obligation or undertaking to update or modify the opinions below as a consequence of any future changes in the laws or in the facts bearing upon those opinions.&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber"></font>&#160;</div>
    <div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;text-align: right;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">March 23, 2021</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Page 3</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; Based on the foregoing, we are of the opinion that:</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; </p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 1.&#160;&#160;&#160; The Opinion Guarantor is validly existing as a corporation under the laws of the State of New Hampshire.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 2.&#160;&#160;&#160; The Opinion Guarantor has the corporate power under the laws of the State of New Hampshire to issue the Guarantees to which it is a party.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; 3.&#160;&#160;&#160; The Guarantees to which the Opinion Guarantor is a party have been duly authorized by the Opinion Guarantor.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; This opinion letter has been prepared for use in connection with the filing by the Parent of a Current Report on Form 8-K relating to the offering, sale
    and issuance of the Notes and the Guarantees.&#160; Please note that we are opining only as to matters set forth herein, and no opinion should be inferred as to any other matters.&#160; </p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160; We hereby consent to the filing of this opinion letter as Exhibit 5.3 to the above-described Form 8-K and to the reference to this firm under the caption
    &#8220;Legal Matters&#8221; in the Prospectus.&#160; In giving this consent, we do not admit that we are an &#8220;expert&#8221; within the meaning of the Securities Act. </p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom: 0pt;margin-top: 0pt;">&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;</p>

<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 99.1
<TEXT>
<html>
  <head>
    <title></title>
    <!-- Licensed to: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc.
         Document created using EDGARfilings PROfile 7.4.0.0
         Copyright 1995 - 2021 Broadridge -->
  </head>
<body>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b>Exhibit 99.1</b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b>T-Mobile Announces Proposed Public Offering of Senior Notes</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;text-align:center;margin-top:0pt;"><b>&#160;</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">March 16, 2021</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">BELLEVUE, Wash.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) (&#8220;T-Mobile&#8221;) announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary (&#8220;T-Mobile
    USA&#8221; or the &#8220;Issuer&#8221;), plans to offer, subject to market and other conditions, up to $3.0 billion aggregate principal amount of senior notes, to be issued in three tranches with maturities in 2026, 2029 and 2031 (collectively, the &#8220;notes&#8221;) in a
    registered public offering.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">T-Mobile USA intends to use $2.0 billion of the net proceeds from the offering of the notes to acquire spectrum licenses pursuant to the FCC&#8217;s C-Band spectrum Auction
    107, with any remainder to be used first to redeem the Issuer&#8217;s 6.500% Senior Notes due 2026 and then for refinancing existing indebtedness on an ongoing basis.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, Citigroup Global Markets Inc., Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., Goldman Sachs &amp; Co. LLC, Barclays Capital Inc., J.P. Morgan
    Securities LLC, Morgan Stanley &amp; Co. LLC and RBC Capital Markets, LLC are the joint book-running managers for the offering of the notes.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">The Issuer has filed a registration statement (including a prospectus) with the Securities and Exchange Commission (&#8220;SEC&#8221;) for the offering of notes to which this
    communication relates. Before you invest, you should read the prospectus in that registration statement and the related prospectus supplement and other documents the Issuer will file with the SEC for more complete information about the Issuer and the
    offering of notes. You may get these documents for free by visiting EDGAR on the SEC Web site at&#160;<u>http://www.sec.gov</u>. Alternatively, the Issuer, any underwriter or any dealer participating in the notes offering will arrange to send you the
    prospectus and related prospectus supplement if you request it by contacting Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, Attn: Prospectus Department, 6933 Louis Stephens Drive, Morrisville, North Carolina 27560, 1-800-221-1037,&#160;<u>usa.prospectus@credit-suisse.com</u>;
    Citigroup, c/o Broadridge Financial Solutions, 1155 Long Island Avenue, Edgewood, NY 11717, or by phone at (800) 831- 9146; Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., Attention: Prospectus Group, 60 Wall Street, New York, New York 10005-2836, by telephone at (800)
    503-4611 or by email at&#160;<u>prospectus.cpdg@db.com</u>; Goldman Sachs &amp; Co. LLC, 200 West Street, New York, New York 10282, Attn: Prospectus Department, Telephone 212-902-1171, Email:&#160;<u>prospectus-ny@ny.email.gs.com</u>; Barclays Capital Inc., c/o
    Broadridge Financial Solutions, 1155 Long Island Avenue, Edgewood, NY 11717,&#160;<u>barclaysprospectus@broadridge.com</u>, (888) 603-5847; J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, c/o Broadridge Financial Solutions, 1155 Long Island Avenue, Edgewood, NY 11717, Phone:
    631-254-1735; Morgan Stanley &amp; Co. LLC, Attention: Prospectus Department, 180 Varick Street, Second Floor, New York, New York 10014 or RBC Capital Markets, LLC, 200 Vesey Street, 8th Floor New York, New York 10281, Attention: Leveraged Capital
    Markets; by telephone at 1-877-280-1299.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><b>This press release shall not constitute an offer to sell or the solicitation of an offer to buy the notes or any other securities, nor shall it constitute an offer,
      solicitation or sale in any jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale is unlawful.</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber"></font>&#160;</div>
    <div style="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER: always" id="DSPFPageBreak">
      <hr noshade="noshade" style="BORDER-LEFT-WIDTH: 0px; HEIGHT: 2px; BORDER-RIGHT-WIDTH: 0px; WIDTH: 100%; BORDER-BOTTOM-WIDTH: 0px; COLOR: #000000; CLEAR: both; MARGIN: 4px 0px; BORDER-TOP-WIDTH: 0px; BACKGROUND-COLOR: #000000"> </div>
  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:8.0pt;margin-top:0pt;"><b>&#160;</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><b>Cautionary Statement Regarding Forward-Looking Statements</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;"><b>&#160;</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><i>This press release contains forward-looking statements that are based on T-Mobile management&#8217;s current expectations. Such statements include, without limitation,
      statements regarding the planned offering of the notes and statements regarding the intended use of proceeds from the offering of the notes. Such forward-looking statements are subject to certain risks, uncertainties and assumptions, including,
      without limitation, prevailing market conditions and other factors. Should one or more of these risks or uncertainties materialize, or should underlying assumptions prove incorrect, actual results may vary materially from those expected. More
      information about potential risk factors that could affect T-Mobile and its results is included in T-Mobile&#8217;s filings with the SEC, which are available at&#160;<u>http://www.sec.gov</u>.</i></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt">T-Mobile US&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><b>Media Relations:</b><br>
    <u>mediarelations@t-mobile.com</u><br>
    or<br>
    <b>Investor Relations:</b><br>
    <u>investor.relations@t-mobile.com</u></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;</p>

  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px"> </p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>

<TYPE>EX-99.2

<FILENAME>nt10021707x7_ex99-2.htm
<DESCRIPTION>EXHIBIT 99.2
<TEXT>
<html>
  <head>
    <title></title>
    <!-- Licensed to: Broadridge Financial Solutions, Inc.
         Document created using EDGARfilings PROfile 7.4.0.0
         Copyright 1995 - 2021 Broadridge -->
  </head>
<body>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: right; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><font style="font-family: Times New Roman, Times, Serif; font-size: 10pt"><b>Exhibit 99.2</b></font></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b>&#160;</b></p>
  <p style="font: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; text-align: center; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt"><b>T-Mobile Agrees to Sell $3.8 Billion of Senior Notes</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">March 16, 2021</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">BELLEVUE, Wash.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- T-Mobile US, Inc. (NASDAQ: TMUS) (&#8220;T-Mobile&#8221;) announced today that T-Mobile USA, Inc., its direct wholly-owned subsidiary (&#8220;T-Mobile
    USA&#8221; or the &#8220;Issuer&#8221;), has agreed to sell $1,200,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 2.625% Senior Notes due 2026 (the &#8220;2026 notes&#8221;), $1,250,000,000 aggregate principal amount of 3.375% Senior Notes due 2029 (the &#8220;2029 notes&#8221;) and $1,350,000,000
    aggregate principal amount of 3.500% Senior Notes due 2031 (the &#8220;2031 notes&#8221; and together with the 2026 notes and the 2029 notes, the &#8220;notes&#8221;) in a registered public offering. The offering of the notes is scheduled to close on March 23, 2021, subject
    to satisfaction of customary closing conditions.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">T-Mobile USA intends to use $2.0 billion of the net proceeds from the offering of the notes to acquire spectrum licenses pursuant to the FCC&#8217;s C-Band spectrum Auction
    107, with the remainder to be used to redeem the Issuer&#8217;s 6.500% Senior Notes due 2026.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, Citigroup Global Markets Inc., Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., Goldman Sachs &amp; Co. LLC, Barclays Capital Inc., J.P. Morgan
    Securities LLC, Morgan Stanley &amp; Co. LLC, RBC Capital Markets, LLC, BNP Paribas Securities Corp., Commerz Markets LLC, Credit Agricole Securities (USA) Inc., Mizuho Securities USA LLC, MUFG Securities Americas Inc., SMBC Nikko Securities America,
    Inc., TD Securities (USA) LLC and Wells Fargo Securities, LLC are the joint book-running managers for the offering of the notes. NatWest Markets Securities Inc., Santander Investment Securities Inc., SG Americas Securities, LLC, Truist Securities,
    Inc., U.S. Bancorp Investments, Inc., CastleOak Securities, L.P., MFR Securities, Inc. and Multi-Bank Securities, Inc. are acting as co-managers.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">The Issuer has filed a registration statement (including a prospectus) with the Securities and Exchange Commission (&#8220;SEC&#8221;) for the offering of notes to which this
    communication relates. Before you invest, you should read the prospectus in that registration statement and the related prospectus supplement and other documents the Issuer will file with the SEC for more complete information about the Issuer and the
    offering of notes. You may get these documents for free by visiting EDGAR on the SEC Web site at&#160;<u>http://www.sec.gov</u>. Alternatively, the Issuer, any underwriter or any dealer participating in the notes offering will arrange to send you the
    prospectus and related prospectus supplement if you request it by contacting Credit Suisse Securities (USA) LLC, Attn: Prospectus Department, 6933 Louis Stephens Drive, Morrisville, North Carolina 27560, 1-800-221-1037,&#160;<u>usa.prospectus@credit-suisse.com</u>;
    Citigroup, c/o Broadridge Financial Solutions, 1155 Long Island Avenue, Edgewood, NY 11717, or by phone at (800) 831- 9146; Deutsche Bank Securities Inc., Attention: Prospectus Group, 60 Wall Street, New York, New York 10005-2836, by telephone at (800)
    503-4611 or by email at&#160;<u>prospectus.cpdg@db.com</u>; Goldman Sachs &amp; Co. LLC, 200 West Street, New York, New York 10282, Attn: Prospectus Department, Telephone 212-902-1171, Email:&#160;<u>prospectus-ny@ny.email.gs.com</u>; Barclays Capital Inc., c/o
    Broadridge Financial Solutions, 1155 Long Island Avenue, Edgewood, NY 11717,&#160;<u>barclaysprospectus@broadridge.com</u>, (888) 603-5847; J.P. Morgan Securities LLC, c/o Broadridge Financial Solutions, 1155 Long Island Avenue, Edgewood, NY 11717, Phone:
    631-254-1735; Morgan Stanley &amp; Co. LLC, Attention:</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <div style="MARGIN-BOTTOM: 10pt; CLEAR: both; MARGIN-TOP: 10pt" id="DSPFPageBreakArea">
    <div style="TEXT-ALIGN: center" id="DSPFPageNumberArea"><font style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman', Times, serif; FONT-WEIGHT: normal; COLOR: #000000; FONT-STYLE: normal" id="DSPFPageNumber"></font>&#160;</div>

  </div>
  <p style="FONT: 10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif; MARGIN: 0pt 0px">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:8.0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;">Prospectus Department, 180 Varick Street, Second Floor, New York, New York 10014 or RBC Capital Markets, LLC, 200 Vesey Street, 8th Floor New York, New York 10281,
    Attention: Leveraged Capital Markets; by telephone at 1-877-280-1299.</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>

      solicitation or sale in any jurisdiction in which such offer, solicitation or sale is unlawful.</b></p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-bottom:0pt;margin-top:0pt;">&#160;</p>
  <p style="font:10pt Times New Roman, Times, Serif;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><b>Cautionary Statement Regarding Forward-Looking Statements</b></p>

      including, without limitation, prevailing market conditions and other factors. Should one or more of these risks or uncertainties materialize, or should underlying assumptions prove incorrect, actual results may vary materially from those expected.
      More information about potential risk factors that could affect T-Mobile and its results is included in T-Mobile&#8217;s filings with the SEC, which are available at&#160;<u>http://www.sec.gov</u>.</i></p>

<a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="top.Show.toggleNext( this );">+ References</a><div style="display: none;"><p>Reference 1: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/role/presentationRef<br> -Publisher SEC<br> -Name Securities Act<br> -Number 230<br> -Section 425<br></p></div>
<a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="top.Show.toggleNext( this );">+ Details</a><div style="display: none;"><table border="0" cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0">
<tr>
<td><strong> Name:</strong></td>
<td style="white-space:nowrap;">dei_WrittenCommunications</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td style="padding-right: 4px;white-space:nowrap;"><strong> Namespace Prefix:</strong></td>
<td>dei_</td>
</tr>
<tr>
<td><strong> Data Type:</strong></td>
<td>xbrli:booleanItemType</td>
</tr>

<td><strong> Balance Type:</strong></td>
<td>na</td>

<td>duration</td>

<FILENAME>Show.js

// Edgar(tm) Renderer was created by staff of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission.  Data and content created by government employees within the scope of their employment are not subject to domestic copyright protection. 17 U.S.C. 105.
var Show={};Show.LastAR=null,Show.showAR=function(a,r,w){if(Show.LastAR)Show.hideAR();var e=a;while(e&&e.nodeName!='TABLE')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e||e.nodeName!='TABLE'){var ref=((window)?w.document:document).getElementById(r);if(ref){e=ref.cloneNode(!0);
e.removeAttribute('id');a.parentNode.appendChild(e)}}
if(e)e.style.display='block';Show.LastAR=e};Show.hideAR=function(){Show.LastAR.style.display='none'};Show.toggleNext=function(a){var e=a;while(e.nodeName!='DIV')e=e.nextSibling;if(!e.style){}else if(!e.style.display){}else{var d,p_;if(e.style.display=='none'){d='block';p='-'}else{d='none';p='+'}
e.style.display=d;if(a.textContent){a.textContent=p+a.textContent.substring(1)}else{a.innerText=p+a.innerText.substring(1)}}}
</TEXT>

<TEXT>
/* Updated 2009-11-04 */
/* v2.2.0.24 */

/* DefRef Styles */
..report table.authRefData{
	background-color: #def;
	border: 2px solid #2F4497;
	font-size: 1em;
	position: absolute;
}

..report table.authRefData a {
	display: block;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report table.authRefData p {
	margin-top: 0px;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide {
	background-color: #2F4497;
	padding: 1px 3px 0px 0px;
	text-align: right;
}

..report table.authRefData .hide a:hover {
	background-color: #2F4497;
}

..report table.authRefData .body {
	height: 150px;
	overflow: auto;
	width: 400px;
}

..report table.authRefData table{
	font-size: 1em;
}

/* Report Styles */
..pl a, .pl a:visited {
	color: black;
	text-decoration: none;
}

/* table */
..report {
	background-color: white;
	border: 2px solid #acf;
	clear: both;
	color: black;
	font: normal 8pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	margin-bottom: 2em;
}

..report hr {
	border: 1px solid #acf;
}

/* Top labels */
..report th {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
	text-align: center;
}

..report th.void	{
	background-color: transparent;
	color: #000000;
	font: bold 10pt Helvetica, Arial, san-serif;
	text-align: left;
}

..report .pl {
	text-align: left;
	vertical-align: top;
	white-space: normal;
	width: 200px;
	white-space: normal; /* word-wrap: break-word; */
}

..report td.pl a.a {
	cursor: pointer;
	display: block;
	width: 200px;
	overflow: hidden;
}

..report td.pl div.a {
	width: 200px;
}

..report td.pl a:hover {
	background-color: #ffc;
}

/* Header rows... */
..report tr.rh {
	background-color: #acf;
	color: black;
	font-weight: bold;
}

/* Calendars... */
..report .rc {
	background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

/* Even rows... */
..report .re, .report .reu {
	background-color: #def;
}

..report .reu td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

/* Odd rows... */
..report .ro, .report .rou {
	background-color: white;
}

..report .rou td {
	border-bottom: 1px solid black;
}

..report .rou table td, .report .reu table td {
	border-bottom: 0px solid black;
}

/* styles for footnote marker */
..report .fn {
	white-space: nowrap;
}

/* styles for numeric types */
..report .num, .report .nump {
	text-align: right;
	white-space: nowrap;
}

..report .nump {
	padding-left: 2em;
}

..report .nump {
	padding: 0px 0.4em 0px 2em;
}

/* styles for text types */
..report .text {
	text-align: left;
	white-space: normal;
}

..report .text .big {
	margin-bottom: 1em;
	width: 17em;
}

..report .text .more {
	display: none;
}

..report .text .note {
	font-style: italic;
	font-weight: bold;
}

..report .text .small {
	width: 10em;
}

..report sup {
	font-style: italic;
}

..report .outerFootnotes {
	font-size: 1em;
}
